--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Benny Hillo" <teletran13@h...> wrote:
> A mysterious transformer steps out of the shadows, carrying a long, 
glowing 
> energon blade. He is surging with energon radiation. "Warning, 
energon 
> resistance low, transform immediatedly," the onboard computer 
warns. 
> "Transform this," he replies, he fires blasts of energon from his 
insectoid 
> legs mounted on his arms at the attacking enemy, blowing his 
weapons and 
> right arm away. The transformer walks over to the fallen enemy and 
gazes 
> into his eyes. "Remeber my name, for it will be the last thing you 
ever 
> know," he tells the fallen enemy as he draws his energon blade, "I 
am 
> Recon," he slams his blade down into the enemy's chest, right 
through his 
> spark.
>
